attributes.action: make it compulsory that employers give their emplotyees 2 days extra anual leave after 5 years continous service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is ridiculous that employees do not get some sort of reward for loyal service to an employer, an extra 2 days anual leave after 5 years continuous service would go some way to redressing the balance, and reward employees for loyalty to their employer
